Functions

 EVALUATE (bfd_formula)
 Integration formula for the 2nd-order Adams-Moulton scheme (implicit scheme).

Detailed Description

2nd-order implicit Adams formula.

a.k.a. the 2nd-order Adams-Moulton formula a.k.a. the trapezoidal rule a.k.a. the backward-forward difference formula

Usage:
  • scheme NOT suited for high-accuracy requirement
  • scheme suited for mildly stiff problems
Initialization:
  • initial condition is required for the dynamic variable x
  • initial value of the derivative xdot computed during the initial time solution
Attention:

Function Documentation

EVALUATE ( bfd_formula   ) 

Integration formula for the 2nd-order Adams-Moulton scheme (implicit scheme).

Returns:
x = bfd( x_init, xdot, dt)
Parameters:
x_init Initial value of the dynamic variable
xdot Time-derivative of the dynamic variable
dt Current time increment
